ygData.subject: Re: WWAAAAAGGGGHHHH
ygData.msgSnippet: HEHEHE-- You reap what ye sow Tunare 3:16 I have not played on a PVP server yet-- once I get bored (as if) with my chars on Xev, I want to check that
ygData.messageBody:
HEHEHE-- "You reap what ye sow" Tunare
3:16<br><br>I have not played on a PVP server yet-- once I get
bored (as if) with my chars on Xev, I want to check
that out-- reminds me of true combat strategies. I can
imagine planning raids against other PCs (much like my
paintball weekends). <br><br>How do guilds work on PVP
servers?? I guess on the PVP team servers, guilds can/shout
only be made up of members of the same team--unless
alliances are formed. I think it would be an adrenaline
rush to be worried about agro-ing mobs AND agro-ing
PCs!!! <br><br>I haven't posted links here because I
post them everywhere else!! ALL DRUIDS go to
www.druids.com. (Easy to remember). <br><br>Xela
Orcbane<br>Non-Player Killer<br>Self Killer
